QuestData.Title: A Lesson in Teamwork
QuestData.Description: One of the most important skills an archaeology team needs is good teamwork. The key to teamwork is knowing when to give and when to take.$b$bThe Highmaul ogres have been excavating mysterious artifacts from the gorge. I want you to team up with the Highmaul ogres in the name of good archaeology!$b$bRemember what I said about giving and taking? The ogres have given us their hard work to excavate the artifacts. Now I want you to take those artifacts from them and bring them here!$b$bIt's teamwork!
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you retrieved the mysterious artifacts? It's all about teamwork!
QuestData.RewardText: You did a great job, kid!$b$bI hope you learned something about teamwork today. Here's your cut, minus my teaching fee... the Steamwheedle Preservation Society service charge... and gratuity of course!
